item.title: Ping.fm bookmarklet for multiple Ping.fm accounts
item.description: Since Ping.fm doesn't allow you to add multiple Twitter accounts to one Ping.fm account, I've resorted to have two accounts with them, one for my personal accounts (Twitter, Facebook, MySpace) and one for my professional accounts (Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn).
